featuresSection.heading: Discover Ideal House Sizes When You Decide to Buy House in Sector 63A
description: Sector 63A offers a variety of housing footprints catering to different family sizes and lifestyle requirements. Whether you are looking for a compact, maintenance-friendly home or a sprawling luxury residence, you will find perfectly designed options here. The properties listed below reflect common constructed areas and plot dimensions available in this premium Gurugram sector, ensuring flexibility for all potential homeowners seeking quality and space.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot (Approx 100 Sq Yards)
features.description: Ideal for young professionals or small nuclear families seeking a well-designed 2 BHK or compact 3 BHK builder floor setup. faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Buy House in Sector 63A
faqSection.description: Find detailed, user-focused answers to the most common queries regarding property purchase, investment potential, and living standards in Sector 63A Gurugram.

faqs.question: What makes Sector 63A a prime location to buy a house in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Sector 63A is considered prime due to its direct frontage on the Golf Course Extension Road, which links it efficiently to the rest of Gurugram and Gurgaon. It is an area characterized by premium residential projects and excellent planned infrastructure, differentiating it from older sectors. The consistent demand from high-net-worth individuals and corporate tenants further solidifies its status. Furthermore, its planned layout ensures reduced traffic congestion and better civic amenities, contributing significantly to a superior quality of life compared to other areas.

faqs.question: What types of residential properties are available for sale in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: The Sector 63A real estate market is diverse, primarily featuring luxury properties. Buyers can find spacious builder floors typically 3 BHK to 5 BHK, ready-to-move apartments in high-rise complexes, and independent villas or houses built on large plots. The housing stock is relatively new, meaning most properties comply with modern building codes and offer sophisticated amenities like power backup, private lifts, and dedicated security systems, catering specifically to the luxury segment.

faqs.question: What is the average price range for a house in Sector 63A Gurugram
faqs.answer: The price range varies widely based on the size, construction quality, specific location within the sector, and whether it is a builder floor or an independent house. Generally, the prices reflect its status as a premium location on the Golf Course Extension Road. Prospective buyers should anticipate premium pricing, often starting higher than average Gurugram prices, but offering significant value in terms of amenities, location advantage, and future appreciation potential. Consulting our experts provides the most accurate current market rates.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63A well connected to Gurgaon and the rest of Gurugram
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Connectivity is one of Sector 63A’s strongest selling points. It is directly connected via the Golf Course Extension Road, offering fast access to NH 48 and the key business districts of Gurugram. It provides multiple routes to South Gurgaon and the Indira Gandhi International Airport, though some distance is involved. The upcoming metro line expansions and enhanced road networks are set to further boost connectivity, making daily commutes highly efficient for those who buy house in Sector 63A.

faqs.question: What essential amenities are available near residential houses in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Residents of Sector 63A enjoy access to unparalleled amenities. This includes highly reputed schools, advanced hospitals, major commercial centers, premium restaurants, and multiplexes within a 5 to 10-minute drive. The sector itself often features well-maintained parks, integrated sports facilities, and dedicated market areas. The self-sufficient nature of the surrounding areas means all daily needs and luxury services are easily accessible.

faqs.question: Are there any new residential projects currently available in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 63A is a dynamically developing area, and several reputable developers continue to launch high-end residential projects, especially builder floor developments and luxury apartment towers. These new projects often incorporate the latest smart home technology and sustainable design principles. We maintain an up-to-date database of all pre-launch, under-construction, and ready-to-move-in properties, which we can share during your consultation to help you buy house in Sector 63A successfully.

faqs.question: What are the typical plot sizes available for custom construction in this sector
faqs.answer: While many housing options are already built, plots for custom construction are sometimes available, typically ranging from 100 square yards (4 Marla equivalent) for smaller projects, up to 500 square yards or more for high-end luxury villas. The availability of larger plots is limited and highly prized. Buyers interested in custom builds must act quickly and work with agents familiar with plot acquisition rules in Sector 63A to ensure a smooth purchase process.

faqs.question: What are the crucial legal aspects to check before buying property here
faqs.answer: Before committing to buy house in Sector 63A, it is crucial to verify the developer's RERA registration, check the property's title deeds for clarity, and ensure all property tax and utility bills are cleared. For builder floors, verify the quality of the building completion certificate and the structural stability reports. Always engage a reputable legal counsel specializing in Gurugram real estate laws to perform a thorough due diligence before signing any agreement.

faqs.question: How does the Golf Course Extension Road benefit residents of Sector 63A
faqs.answer: The Golf Course Extension Road is the lifeline of Sector 63A. It provides high-speed connectivity, driving up the accessibility and prestige of the area. It connects directly to the older Golf Course Road and the rest of the new Gurugram micro-markets. This arterial road has driven infrastructure development, attracted premium retail and commercial ventures, and ensures the long-term desirability and rental potential of houses in the sector.

faqs.question: What future development plans will impact property value in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Future development plans include further widening of the existing infrastructure, potential extensions of the metro network nearby, and the continuous influx of major IT and corporate offices moving closer to the SPR corridor. The improved connectivity provided by the Gurgaon-Mumbai Expressway also indirectly benefits Sector 63A. These planned infrastructural boosts are guaranteed to further appreciate property values, making it an excellent time to buy house in Sector 63A now before prices rise significantly.
